outcome_fields_reference.text: Narrative outcome that gets posted. This is always required.
outcome_fields_reference.death: Boolean. If true, marks the player as Dead. Optional.
outcome_fields_reference.status: String or list. Adds status effect(s) like 'Cursed', 'Wounded'. Optional.
outcome_fields_reference.title: String. Sets a new role or title, e.g., 'Champion of Ash'. Optional.
outcome_fields_reference.items: List. Adds item(s) to the player's inventory. Optional.

mechanics_notes.ReactBlock: Handled automatically. Dead players can't join new quests unless resurrected.
mechanics_notes.GhostReact: If a Dead player reacts to a campaign message, ghost flavor text is posted and resurrection logic is triggered.
mechanics_notes.ResurrectionByItem: If a player reacts and another user has a revival item (e.g., 'Phoenix Ember'), the system can auto-revive the dead player if conditions are met.
mechanics_notes.Performance: The bot uses player win/loss ratio and status to determine 'High/Low' or 'Success/Failure'.

Death + title + item.text: You fall, but leave behind something sacred.
Death + title + item.title: The Fallen

Reward-only success.text: You overcame the trial and found a relic.
